ygData.subject: RE: Niv's Melody of Preservation
ygData.msgSnippet: I thought any hit that exceeded a damage shield s remaining hit absorbtion was suffered in full?  If this is a 10pt damage shield will it ever help? Kit ...
ygData.messageBody:
I thought any hit that exceeded a damage shield's remaining hit absorbtion
was suffered in full? If this is a 10pt damage shield will it ever help?

Kit

Subject: [eqbards] Niv's Melody of Preservation
